list.name: Changes
list.comment: Add dynamic theming support with customizable color palettes: integrated theme constants, updated UI elements for theme adaptability, and added user preference management for selecting themes.

task.summary: Implement core functionalities for course tracking. Introduced tab navigation, course addition with customizable review intervals, localStorage persistence, and task planning logic with overdue and upcoming reviews. Enhanced UI/UX with interactive components and TailwindCSS styling.
Introduce user profiles with semester tracking. Added new types, onboarding modal, and semester-specific course filters. Enhanced UI with updated headers and profile management.
Add university suggestions for autocompletion in user profile form. Enhanced input with `datalist` functionality for better usability.

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment: Add university suggestions for autocompletion in user profile form. Enhanced input with `datalist` functionality for better usability.

task.summary: Integrate Firebase for authentication and Firestore database. Added user authentication with Google, profile management syncing with Firestore, and real-time course updates. Enhanced UX with loading states and error handling.

Configure Firebase hosting with static export. Updated `.gitignore`, added Firebase configuration files (`firebase.json`, `.firebaserc`), and static `404.html` and `index.html` templates. Adjusted `next.config.ts` for static build compatibility.
Update `.gitignore` to exclude `forme.txt` and modify IDE workspace configuration
Update branding: rename `J-Master.Med` to `Med&J` in UI components.

Add date navigation and dynamic week labels for the planning view. Enhanced timeline logic with utility functions for week calculations and improved handling of "Today" and "Tomorrow" labels. Introduced navigation controls for previous/next week and reset to the current week.

Enhance layout styling and components: adjust max-width for responsive design, improve sticky headers with backdrop blur, refine timeline layout with grid for larger screens, and optimize "Today" task styling.
Introduce enhanced UX modals for error handling and course deletion confirmation. Add animations for smoother transitions, refine state management for modals, and improve visual styling.
Add "Profile" tab with enhanced user preferences management, onboarding improvements, and save state handling. Refined tab navigation, updated modals, and improved UX for profile form interactions.
Refine layout structure and styling: update container to full-screen dimensions, enhance header and navigation controls with flexible positioning, and optimize main content scroll behavior.
Add dynamic theming support with customizable color palettes: integrated theme constants, updated UI elements for theme adaptability, and added user preference management for selecting themes.

MESSAGE.value: Implement core functionalities for course tracking. Introduced tab navigation, course addition with customizable review intervals, localStorage persistence, and task planning logic with overdue and upcoming reviews. Enhanced UI/UX with interactive components and TailwindCSS styling.
Introduce user profiles with semester tracking. Added new types, onboarding modal, and semester-specific course filters. Enhanced UI with updated headers and profile management.
Add university suggestions for autocompletion in user profile form. Enhanced input with `datalist` functionality for better usability.

Integrate Firebase for authentication and Firestore database. Added user authentication with Google, profile management syncing with Firestore, and real-time course updates. Enhanced UX with loading states and error handling.

Configure Firebase hosting with static export. Updated `.gitignore`, added Firebase configuration files (`firebase.json`, `.firebaserc`), and static `404.html` and `index.html` templates. Adjusted `next.config.ts` for static build compatibility.
Update `.gitignore` to exclude `forme.txt` and modify IDE workspace configuration
Update branding: rename `J-Master.Med` to `Med&J` in UI components.

Add date navigation and dynamic week labels for the planning view. Enhanced timeline logic with utility functions for week calculations and improved handling of "Today" and "Tomorrow" labels. Introduced navigation controls for previous/next week and reset to the current week.

Enhance layout styling and components: adjust max-width for responsive design, improve sticky headers with backdrop blur, refine timeline layout with grid for larger screens, and optimize "Today" task styling.
Introduce enhanced UX modals for error handling and course deletion confirmation. Add animations for smoother transitions, refine state management for modals, and improve visual styling.
Add "Profile" tab with enhanced user preferences management, onboarding improvements, and save state handling. Refined tab navigation, updated modals, and improved UX for profile form interactions.
Refine layout structure and styling: update container to full-screen dimensions, enhance header and navigation controls with flexible positioning, and optimize main content scroll behavior.
Add dynamic theming support with customizable color palettes: integrated theme constants, updated UI elements for theme adaptability, and added user preference management for selecting themes.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Add dynamic theming support with customizable color palettes: integrated theme constants, updated UI elements for theme adaptability, and added user preference management for selecting themes.
